LegoWinnovation

For Winnovation I was asked by teacher for designing Lego prices to be
given away during the event. These prices needed to have IT as their theme next to what they awarded. So for the green award the theme was IT and plants.

These prices where designed by me with two teacher (whom are Lego fans)
as the clients. Besides making the models I was also tasked with creating
the instructions and all required images, like those used in the instructions but also those used as strickers. Futhermore I was tasked with providing files for the clients so they could easily buy all the required parts.

If you wish to buy the sets, please contact me for instructions.
Site by Jens Hobo 2023 V3.0
